class.name: sr_ronex_mechanism_model/AnalogueToJointPosition
class.description: This transmission is used to map one analogue pin from the RoNeX General IO board to a joint position in the robot urdf.

class.name: sr_ronex_mechanism_model/AnalogueToJointEffort
class.description: This transmission is used to map one analogue pin from the RoNeX General IO board to a joint effort in the robot urdf.
